title: Edible Wild Plants - Video Field Guide to 100 Useful Wild Herbs
description:
Edible Wild Plants - Video Field Guide to 100 Useful Wild Herbs (1988)

Source: VHS
Video: XviD 512 x 384
Audio: 80kbps VBR MP3
Runtime: 53:47

Co-author Dr. Jim Duke and Jim Meuninck take you afield identifying, harvesting and cooking edible wild plants. Learn Native American and pioneer uses as well as Chinese medicinal uses. Discover how to make healthful herbal teas. Make "berry delicious desserts". Video identifies poisonous plants and poisonous look-a-likes.

    * Discover how to identify and prepare 100 edible wild plants.
    * Learn to identify poisonous plants and poisonous look-a-likes.
    * Uncover Native American, Chinese and Pioneer medicinal uses.
    * Step by step recipes on camera, easy to follow.
